content.prompt: Which of the following developments best explains the reasons for the growth of a new urban culture in the late 1800s?

choices.label: Ideas and definitions of citizenship changed and became more inclusive.
International and internal migration increased urban populations and brought diverse people to cities.
Increasing numbers of settlers moved west in search of land and economic opportunities.
Many thinkers and business leaders argued that government should play a limited role in the economy.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
